title: Export: GitHub push
description: Implement GitHub export with user-provided token; push to repo/branch.
requirements: Accept repo URL, branch, and commit message
Create temp git repo from current workspace
Push over HTTPS using provided token
plan: Create temporary git repo from workspace
Push using provided token; store artifact record
acceptance_criteria: Push succeeds and returns commit SHA
Artifact record includes repo, branch, SHA
test_plan: Mock git remote and verify push flow
